attributes.action: Send Aid to Help the Yemen Crisis
attributes.additional_details: The Yemen healthcare system is under enormous strain & there isn't any food. A child dies every 10 minutes due to starvation. We are able to help, and we should help.
attributes.background: Yemen is facing the worst humanitarian crisis in a century. They're dealing with a Cholera epidemic, the Covid-19 pandemic, famine & war, all at the same time. The UK should send significant aid to help the people of Yemen in these unprecedented times.
